Title: Includes acts designated as hate crimes to the definition of designated offense for purposes of eavesdropping and video surveillance warrants
Summary: Includes acts designated as hate crimes to the definition of designated offense for purposes of eavesdropping and video surveillance warrants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to including acts designated as hate crimes to the definition of designated offense for purposes of eavesdropping and video surveillance warrants
